Board.name: braille_alphabets
Board.author: Srishti Sethi (srishakatux@gmail.com)
Board.title: Discover the Braille system
Board.description: Learn and memorize the Braille system.
Board.goal: Let kids discover the Braille system.
Board.manual: The screen has 3 sections: an interactive braille cell, an instruction telling you the letter to reproduce, and at the top the Braille letters to use as a reference. Each level teaches a set of 10 letters.
